Key Match Events: Mexico advanced 4-2 on penalty kicks after Edrick Menjívar stepped off his line twice before, leading to controversial referee calls.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Referee Iván Barton added 11 minutes of stoppage time during the match, which was criticized for favoring Mexico.
Iván Barton has a history of controversial decisions, including a controversial penalty kick in a Concacaf World Cup qualifying match and not showing Lionel Messi a yellow card in the Leagues Cup.
